destinations.name: Destinations
destinations.title: Destinations
destinations.paragraph: Planet Earth is our first home and one of the most beautiful. It has varied ecosystems, diversity in its flora and fauna and societies based on the 'planetary economy', ideal for families who are interested in wildlife.

first.title: Earth
first.paragraph: Planet Earth is our first home and one of the most beautiful. It has varied ecosystems, ideal for families who are interested in wildlife.

second.title: Mars
second.paragraph: With great deserts and with the highest mountain in the solar system, it is a good place for brave explorers and adventurers.

third.title: Europa
third.paragraph: Europa has the smoothest surface of any known solid object in the Solar System, it is perfect for lovers of winter sports and travel for couples who want to experience a unique moment.

earth.name: Earth
earth.title: Planet Earth
earth.paragraph: Planet Earth is our first home and one of the most beautiful. It has varied ecosystems, diversity in its flora and fauna and societies based on the 'planetary economy', ideal for families who are interested in wildlife.

first.title: Machu Picchu, Perú
first.paragraph: Machu Picchu is one of those places that must be enjoyed at least once in a lifetime.

second.title: Angkor, Camboya
second.paragraph: The ancient Khmer empire and considered the largest religious structure on planet Earth.

third.title: Taj Mahal, Agra, India
third.paragraph: One of the most beautiful buildings on planet Earth and the greatest work ever built for love.

fourth.title: Petra, Jordania
fourth.paragraph: Cross the Siq first thing in the morning to find yourself in front of the Treasury, the wonders of Petra.

fifth.title: Great Wall, China
fifth.paragraph: One of the most famous places on planet Earth, you can see it from space.

sixth.title: Easter Island, Chile
sixth.paragraph: A land of an ancient culture, centuries-old traditions, amazing volcanoes and mysterious figures.

cities.title: The best cities on planet Earth to visit

mars.name: Mars
mars.title: Planet Mars
mars.paragraph: The planet Mars is the first planet colonized by our ancestors, with great deserts and with the highest mountain in the solar system, it is a good place for brave explorers and adventurers.

first.title: Hellas Planitia
first.paragraph: With a diameter of about 2,300 km, it is the largest unambiguous impact structure on the planet.

second.title: Solis Planum
second.paragraph: Solis Planum was named after a classic albedo feature name, and its name was approved in 1973.

third.title: Utopia Planitia
third.paragraph: The place where the main shipyard of the United Federation of Planets is located.

fourth.title: Olympus Mons
fourth.paragraph: Olympus Mons is about two and a half times Mount Everest's (Planet Earth) height above sea level.

fifth.title: Arcadia Planitia
fifth.paragraph: Arcadia Planitia is a smooth plain with fresh lava flows, perfect for a romantic walk.

sixth.title: Noachis Terra
sixth.paragraph: Visit the city of Noachis One with your family, and enjoy the hustle and bustle of the long nights.

cities.title: The best cities on planet Mars to visit

europa.name: Europa
europa.title: Satellite Europa
europa.paragraph: Europa has the smoothest surface of any known solid object in the Solar System, it is perfect for lovers of winter sports and travel for couples who want to experience a unique moment.

first.title: Chaos Transition
first.paragraph: Europa features a widely varied landscape, including ridges, bands, small rounded domes and disrupted spaces.

second.title: Crisscrossing Bands
second.paragraph: The long, linear ridges and bands that crisscross Europa's surface, perfect to play hide and seek.

third.title: Harmonia Linea
third.paragraph: Home of the first settler and the greenest place on the planet.

fourth.title: Moytura Regio
fourth.paragraph: Stroll through the plains of Moytura and enjoy the wind on your skin.

fifth.title: Agenor
fifth.paragraph: Home of the first indigenous communities of the satellite.

sixth.title: Corick Linea
sixth.paragraph: Spend a romantic night in the best hotels in Europe, visit Corick.

cities.title: The best cities on satellite Europa to visit
